channel.title: openbsd, virtualization on Raskell
channel.description: Recent content in openbsd, virtualization on Raskell

item.title: My OpenBSD journey: Getting it virtualized with libvirt (1)
item.description: Void Linux as my daily driver Around six months ago, I decided to ditch my long in the tooth Arch-based setup on my belovest Thinkpad X1 Carbon. I’ve been very loyal over the years, and almost came to belive that Arch will be a constant in my adult life. While I kept up with upcoming technologies, I somehow lost track of the ever so diversifying landscape of Linux distributions.
